pages.text: ane tame a sthiti yada karo ke allaha ta'ala'e tamone ada pachi nayaba banavya ane tamane dharati para raheva mate jagya api, jethi narama dharati para mahela banavo cho ane parvatone kotarine temam ghara banavo cho, to allaha ta'alani ne'amatone yada karo ane dharatimam vidroha na phelavo

temani komamam je ghamandi saradaro hata, te'o'e gariba lokone ke je'o imana lavya hata, puchyum: Sum tamane te vatani khatari che ke saliha (a.Sa.) Potana palanahara taraphathi avatarita thaya che, te'o'e kahyum ke ni:Sanka ame to tena para puro bharoso kari'e chi'e, je temane la'ine mokalavamam avya che
ghamandi loko kaheva lagya ke tame je vata para imana lavya cho, ame to tena inkara karanara che
Basa! Te'o'e te untadine mari nakhi ane potana palanaharana adesano virodha karyo ane kaheva lagya ke he saliha! Jeni dhamaki tame amone apata hata, te batavo jo tame payagambara hova
basa! Te'one dharatikampe pakadi lidha, ane te'o potana gharomam undha ja padya rahya

te samaye (saliha a.Sa.) Temanathi modhum pheravi calava lagya, ane kaheva lagya ke he mari koma! Mem to tamara sudhi potana palanaharano adesa pahoncadi didho hato, ane hum tamaro subhecchaka rahyo, parantu tame loko subhecchakone pasanda nathi karata
ane ame luta (a.Sa.) Ne mokalya, jyare ke te'o'e potani komane kahyum ke tame evum nirlajaja karya karo cho, jevum tamara pahela samagra srstivala'o manthi ko'i'e nathi karyum
tame puruso sathe aslilatanum karya karo cho, stri'one chodine, jo ke tame to hada vatavi didhi che
